title: People of Bihar will vote for development: …
content:
By ANI | ANI  –  
New Delhi, Sept. 9 (ANI): Union Information and Technology Minister Ravi Shankar Prasad on Wednesday said that the NDA is prepared for the upcoming assembly elections in Bihar, adding that the people of the state would vote for development in the upcoming polls. 
 
"Modi ji and the NDA want development in Bihar. Lalu ji, Nitish ji and Sonia ji just want to stop Modi ji. We are prepared for Bihar elections and we are going to win. People will vote on the issue of development," Prasad told ANI. 
 
The Election Commission today announced five phase polling for the assembly elections in Bihar beginning on October 12. 
 
The results of the elections will be declared on November 8. (ANI)
